body:
jobtastic- Celery tasks plus more awesome
=========================================

A Celery library that makes your user-responsive long-running jobs totally
awesomer.

Why jobtastic?
--------------

Installation
------------

1. Get the project source and install it::

    $ pip install jobtastic

Is it Awesome?
--------------
